accessibility.text: Many tasks in NLP rely on finding correspondences across domains/languages
Many tasks in NLP rely on finding correspondences across domains/languages
Ideally, solved by large amounts of parallel data. Broader applicability requires unsupervised approaches
Many tasks in NLP rely on finding correspondences across domains/languages
Ideally, solved by large amounts of parallel data. Broader applicability requires unsupervised approaches
Word-to-word translation (a.k.a bilingual lexical induction) - litmus test
Many tasks in NLP rely on finding correspondences across domains/languages
Ideally, solved by large amounts of parallel data. Broader applicability requires unsupervised approaches
Word-to-word translation (a.k.a bilingual lexical induction) - litmus test
Recent fully unsupervised methods perform on par with supervised counterparts [Conneau et al., 2018; Artetxte et al., 2018a,b; etc]
